title: BootStrapBoutique.com Niche Market Website
text: Questions Business Summary Pure-Ecommerce is excited to bring you this unique niche market specialty online boutique for sale - Introducing BootStrapBoutique.com! Kick-up your boots and jump into the equestrian world. This user-friendly online business offers horse lovers a fabulous collection of products including furniture & decor, clothing, accessories, boots, jewelry and gifts. Whether a shopper loves being in the show ring, riding the trails or simply loves western style - BootStrapBoutique.com is the online boutique to find all their necessities! Site includes: - Access to the Pure-Ecommerce ELearning Library-FREE UPDATES! - Access to Webinars and Teaching Sessions - 800 Drop Shipped Products Loaded - Drop Ship Product Vendors Researched in Specified Market - Drop Ship Product Vendors Contacted & Applied to Setup Relationship - Approved Product Vendor Relationships Transferred at Time of Purchase - Pure-Ecommerce Premium Shopping Cart - SEO Specific Keyword Names for All Pages Creating a Keyword Specific URL - Meta Tag Descriptions Completed For All Category and Sub-Category Pages - Site Map Submitted to Google - Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest& Blog Icons Connected to Your Home page - Matching Social Media Pages - Matching Business Card Design (printing not included) - jQuery Slide Show Feature - Product Zoom Feature Built In - Product Review/Product Rating Feature
